name: Harvest Defender
description:
WASD to move, Spacebar to interact.

Plant, tend, and harvest your crops while letting them defend your farm from the zombie bunny horde.

Seeds can only be planted in watered earth, and plants only grow if they stay watered.

Once a plant is mature, it can't attack, so harvest it with the basket, place your harvest in the selling crate, and use the proceeds to plant more defenders!
